reviewText: This guy knows more about kyusho than most people who train.  he works as a police officer and has used kyusho techniques to arrest close to a thousand druggies who did not want to be arrested .  So when someone writes there is too much fluff they are usually someone that does not understand kyusho jitsu but like to write negative stuff because they are ignorant.
Found there to be too fluff on this first DVD, not enough Kyusho pressure points or techniques
